summary: A small, cozy cabin nestled in the marshes of Hjaalmarch with a secret basement for storage and your vampiric needs.
descriptionHtml:
[b]HAHA DON'T DOWNLOAD THIS RIGHT NOW. Working on fixing some big bugs. This is my first mod. I'm completely new at this so it's totally expected I'd break the game...[/b]

[b]Requires[/b]
[list][*][b]Latest version of Skyrim[/b][/*]
[*][b]Dawnguard[/b][/*]
[/list]
So if you're like me you love seemingly small houses with secret rooms. I also like cabins and the marshes just outside Morthal and also need a secret vampire lair. Solution? Nightshade Cabin.
It's located just between The Apprentice Stone and Folgunthur in Hjaalmarch.

This is my first mod! Please be gentle.
Please let me know of any bugs you find and I will do my best to fix them.
[list]
[*][size=2]Currently working on Sleeping Giant Inn bug! Sorry I was not able to get to this sooner.[/size]
[/list]
author: butofcourse
